message.content:
cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.CE

The paper discusses the use of fog and cloud computing for Industry 4.0 applications, which are related to networking and communication (cs.NI). The paper also mentions the use of Network Coding (NC) as a tool for data distribution, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). The proposed architecture involves dynamically allocating workload, which is a topic in distributed computing (cs.DC). The paper also mentions the need for low latency communications and highly reliable systems, which are topics in control systems (cs.SY) and computer engineering (cs.CE).
